document.docAuthor: Rasmussen, Claus, Thomas, Jennifer C. & Engel, Michael S.
document.masterDocTitle: A New Genus of Eastern Hemisphere Stingless Bees (Hymenoptera: Apidae), with a Key to the Supraspecific Groups of Indomalayan and Australasian Meliponini

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A New Genus of Eastern Hemisphere Stingless Bees (Hymenoptera: Apidae), with a Key to the Supraspecific Groups of Indomalayan and Australasian Meliponini

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Trigona ambusta Cockerell, 1918: 387
. Synonymy vide Schwarz (1939) .

subSubSection.paragraph:
